body.name: MAGOLFIN Magnetic Golf Speaker with Storage Case, IPX7 Portable Golf Cart Speaker 24H Playtime, 18W Loud Stereo Sound Magnetic Bluetooth Speaker for Golf Cart Accessories, Golf Gifts for Men Women
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 mins
features: [Ultimate Convenience with a Magnetic Bluetooth Speaker]: This portable speaker comes complete with a built-in super strong magnet and a detachable lanyard, making it easy to carry and magnetically attach to golf carts, bikes, scooters, basketball posts, or clip to golf bags, backpacks, strollers, and more. It's the perfect choice for golf cart speakers and outdoor Bluetooth speakers, ensuring you can enjoy your music wherever you go.

[Powerful and Punchy with Loud Bass]: Prepare to be blown away by the brilliant sound of our wireless speakers with Bluetooth. Equipped with an 18W high-power stereo audio driver and a metal bass diaphragm, this portable speaker delivers powerful, full-range, distortion-free sound with punchy audio and deep bass. The built-in advanced Bluetooth chip enables faster, more stable data transmission and zero-delay playback. Plus, with the built-in 2500mAh high-capacity battery, you can enjoy up to 24 hours of continuous music time on a single charge.

[Waterproof and Shockproof for Any Adventure]: Built to withstand any adventure, our waterproof speaker is designed with military-grade quality, perfect golf cart accessories. With its tough rubberized coating, IPX7 waterproofing, and shockproof design, it's perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. Relax and enjoy your ultimate entertainment without worry during your outdoor adventures.

[Immersive Surround Sound]: Take your audio experience to the next level with our portable Bluetooth speakers, essential golf accessories for men. Supporting TF cards and featuring TWS functionality, these speakers provide a truly immersive audio experience. For a surround sound experience that's unparalleled, you can even purchase two speakers together, creating a 360° stereo sound just like being in a movie theater.

[A Wonderful Gift Idea]: Looking for an ideal golf gifts for men? Look no further. Our magnetic bluetooth speaker is the perfect choice. Its integrated magnet and detachable hook make it easy to use outdoors or indoors. Bring more joy and decompression to your golfing experience. For a truly immersive and loud sound, we recommend carrying two or more golf cart speakers bluetooth with you to the golf course and enjoy the 360° stereo experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Wonderful Gift for Golfer MAGOLFIN X10 golf speaker is equipped with powerful magnets that firmly adhere and includes a storage case, making it a great gift for golfers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have not got a chance to try this on the golf course yet, but I have it on my utv and it sounds great. My utv is gas powered and it plenty loud enough to rock while rolling through the neighborhood. The magnet is strong and will stick to a golf cart with no worries of falling off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong hold great sound!
reviews.reviewText: Got this for golfing as my old speaker kept falling off golf carts from hard bumps. This speaker is sturdy and magnet holds strong. I had no issues of it falling off ever yet. The Bluetooth set up is quick and easy. Sound quality was surprisingly better than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This isn't just for golfing, we love using this speaker for every day use. Good sound quality for the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Play with music
reviews.reviewText: Its sleek design seamlessly attaches to your golf cart, providing a powerful and clear sound that enhances your entire golfing experience. The magnetic base is so strong and secures it in place, even during swings and bumps on the course. The speaker's impressive battery life keeps the music flowing for an entire round, while the water-resistant construction adds durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice features but lacking volume and bass.
reviews.reviewText: I put this little speaker to work in a 1500 square foot gym. It lacks a bit of volume and alot of bass. It would be more at home in a 1000 square foot or less room.It does have some features that other speakers don't have like a MicroSD card to play music without pairing to anything. The blind navigation is rough though.The magnetic base is a nice touch. Surprisingly useful!The quality of the unit is top notch. I am very impressed.My Soundcore Anker Mini 3 is a similar size if not smaller and has far superior sound performance - volume and certainly bass. We will compare it to this - a small portable speaker with mild water resistance.Value - not good. The soundcore mini 3 is $20 cheaper.Sound - not as good.Features - the Magolfin wins hands down with the magnetic base and the MicroSD card slot.Rating:-1 star for value-1 star for sound quality as compared to other cheaper options.I would rate this 4 stars if it was $20-30 for sure. It is a great little speaker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every Feature Imaginable In a Bluetooth Speaker
reviews.reviewText: In the box you get the bluetooth speaker, a wrist strap, a carabiner, a USB-A to USB-C charging cable, a male to male microphone jack, an instruction manual, and a zippered carrying case.I have had many bluetooth speakers over the years, yet I have always been searching for the ultimate one. I think that I’ve finally found it.Not only does this Bluetooth speaker perform all of its expected tasks as I would hope that it would, the crowning feature is its magnet. It holds fast and strong to anything metal, which is a wow factor and also makes it worry free.The sound that this Bluetooth speaker produces is very rich. It has a diaphragm, which makes for some very deep bass. The main speaker is full range, and the sound is crystal clear out of it. In addition, it gets pretty loud.The fact that it is waterproof is amazing. The rubberized container is very grippy in your hands, And the battery lasts for an extremely long time. The controls are very intuitive, but I do wish that they colorized the buttons and made them glow in the dark, as it is hard to differentiate between them without inspecting them closely. This speaker also gives you the ability to pair a second one to it, but I did not test that.The zippered case that it comes in holds all of the attachments together and also adds some protection when traveling. This Bluetooth speaker has absolutely every feature that I could ever hope for, and the presentation of it is very strong. It is very giftable and definitely deserving of five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong magnetic speaker
reviews.reviewText: This magnetic speaker can be used for any metal surface but is marketed for a golf cart. The magnet is super strong and you won't need to be worried about it falling off. You literally have to tug hard at it to pull it away from the metal surface. The speaker is bluetooth enabled and you can connect up to 2 of these at the same time for some more surround sound. The sound is loud and crisp and for the size much louder than other speakers of comparable size. It's actually got a decent amount of bass as well. I like the rubberized coating and will withstand drops and the rough. It's also waterproof so can be around the pool as well. I like the case it comes with. Also comes with a lanyard, usb A to C harger, and double male auxiliary mic cable. Weighs about a pound. Overall an excellent speaker and given the quality and features, worth the price in my opinion. Would be a great gift for anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I tested this in a disc golf tournament in the rain. I had this going for well over two hours with constant rain coming down and there was no issue. It is adequately priced at $44.99 and I think the value really is there. As I said, this was running for over two hours and the battery had not chirped at me, so who knows how long it could last. The thing that I am most impressed with is the magnet; this thing is super strong! I put the speaker on my fridge and had a hard time pulling it off the magnet is so strong. I highly recommend this to be your next speaker choice as the sound quality and other features make it very desirable.
